column4: got a question here, i have 2 hard drives, 80 sata and 500gb sata. I have windows 7 x64 pro installed on the 80, and have just installed ubuntu 9.10 on hte 500. I want to dualboot. which bootloader should i keep? how do i go about this
grub2 can boot both, the 80 will not have its bootloader changed, just point the BIOS at the 500 and grub2 will load
